english.segment1: Did it seem to disappoint you. Living alone?. By the banks of your dilemma. Out of control. No one seems to give the answers that you wanna hear. What you'd give to find a welcome here
english.segment2: Miles and miles of lies behind you. Those were the days. So many lives you'd hope would guide you. Help you find a way. Now it seems to your surprise that they left you lying here. What you'd give to dry these bitter tears
english.segment3: Did it come naturally?. You a million miles from home. When you tried so carefully. To live a life that's not your own. Always remember that it wasn't that long ago. I stilled the oceans. I moved the mountains. To say I love you
english.segment4: Heaven waits, the hours of silence. Finds you on your knees. Broken in a sweet surrender. Of peace. All the years of searching for a love you didn't know. Now you've finally found a welcome home
english.segment6: BRIDGE: I love you, I have and I always will.
